channel.title: [NEW PLAYERS ONLY] Star Trek Adventures Express
channel.description:
# Star Trek Adventures Express: Fresh Out of Starfleet Academy ## Are you new to the Gauntlet? This is the session for you!
This game is reserved for people new to the Gauntlet: members who just joined the Gauntlet in 2021, or people who have never played in a regular monthly session.
We'll focus on having fun, but the GM will also coach players adapting to online play and using tools in Gauntlet games to ensure player safety and comfort.
-------
[ **Star Trek Adventures Express** ](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/star-trek-adventures-express-age-of-ravens) is an adaptation of Star Trek Adventures published by Modiphius. STAE streamlines the rules and mechanics while preserving everything Star Trek.
Players assume the role of officers aboard a starship, in the same timeframe as Picard’s Enterprise. We will determine the exact configuration of the ship and crew in our first session. We will also define the crew’s mission.
--------
## **At-a-Glance**
**System** : Star Trek Adventures Express (Hack of Star Trek Adventures, tuned to improvisational online play) **The Pitch** : You’re an officer on board a ship in Picard-era Star Trek. **Schedule** : Four Tuesdays in May x 2.5-hours/session **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording Session** : With consent from all players **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players **Attendance** : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
**Additional information** * GM’s [Statement of Style](https://forms.gle/1BjgY7xjGfJuG6928) * This game will follow the [Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MV3DQCQMwkTQ-9DqxSl Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MV3DqIvg7V0LYCq95Rk Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MV3E5cKqFxBdPzywjEs Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MV3EL15wELoPcH4GWYk
